name: AgentVerse
key_features: Task-solving framework for collaborative multi-agent systems
Supports local LLMs such as LLaMA and Vicuna
Demos including NLP Classroom, Prisoner's Dilemma, and Software Design
Extensible configuration of agents and environments
supported_models: Local LLMs like LLaMA and Vicuna
description: AgentVerse is an open-source framework for orchestrating LLM-driven agents that collaborate in configurable environments.
long_description: Developers compose multiple role-playing agents and simulate interactions to solve tasks or study complex scenarios. The platform supports OpenAI and local models like LLaMA or Vicuna, includes demos such as NLP Classroom and Prisoner's Dilemma, and allows extensible configuration of agents and environments.
